title: English Beginner - Lesson 1
content: This is a detailed step-by-step explanation for English (Beginner) lesson 1. It covers examples, theory, and exercises to help learners progress from basics to mastery.
steps: Step 1: Understand the basics of English at Beginner level.
Step 2: Work through example problems related to English.
Step 3: Apply the concept in exercises.
Step 4: Review mistakes and refine understanding.
